name: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition

cards.name: Allied Strategies
cards.text: Domain — Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands he or she controls.
cards.flavor: Each commander looked at the others and wondered who would be first to break the alliance.

cards.name: Armadillo Cloak
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
cards.flavor: "Don't laugh. It works."

cards.name: Bone Shredder
cards.text:
Flying
Echo {2}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Bone Shredder enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.

cards.name: Carrion Feeder
cards.text:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.
cards.flavor: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

cards.name: Charging Troll
cards.text:
Vigilance
{G}: Regenerate Charging Troll.
cards.flavor: They stop for nothing, not even the end of a battle.

cards.name: Coalition Relic
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

cards.name: Darigaaz's Charm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Darigaaz's Charm deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
• Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Darigaaz, the Igniter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Darigaaz, the Igniter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, choose a color, then that player reveals his or her hand and Darigaaz deals damage to the player equal to the number of cards of that color revealed this way.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"From void evolved Phyrexia. Great Yawgmoth, Father of Machines, saw its perfection. Thus the Grand Evolution began."
—Phyrexian Scriptures

cards.name: Elfhame Palace
cards.text:
Elfhame Palace enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Llanowar has seven elfhames, or kingdoms, each with its own ruler. Their palaces are objects of awe, wonder, and envy.

cards.name: Evasive Action
cards.text: Domain — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor: Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.

cards.name: Exotic Curse
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Domain — Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor:
Fouler than a necromancer's kiss.
—Jamuraan expression

cards.name: Fertile Ground
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
cards.flavor: As Phyrexians descended, Multani paused to reflect on the beauty that might never be seen again.

cards.name: Gerrard Capashen
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand.
{3}{W}: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.

cards.name: Gerrard's Command
cards.text: Untap target creature. It gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Unless you like the idea of becoming some goblin's lunch, get up and move!"

cards.name: Harrow
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: No spot in nature is truly barren.

cards.name: Hideous End
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
cards.flavor: Death is a generous author, always willing to grant a stirring final chapter.

cards.name: Hornet
cards.text: Flying, haste

cards.name: Hornet Cannon
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying and haste named Hornet onto the battlefield. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Lightning Greaves
cards.text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}
cards.flavor: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

cards.name: Living Death
cards.text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Narrow Escape
cards.text: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. You gain 4 life.
cards.flavor: He could find no strength left to budge, no power left to fight, no will left to live. Luckily, they could find him.

cards.name: Nomadic Elf
cards.text: {1}{G}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: "I've journeyed across Dominaria. Phyrexians are everywhere. Plague is everywhere. There's no place left to hide."

cards.name: Order of Yawgmoth
cards.text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Whenever Order of Yawgmoth deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

cards.name: Phyrexian Arena
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
cards.flavor: An audience of one with the malice of thousands.

cards.name: Phyrexian Battleflies
cards.text:
Flying
{B}: Phyrexian Battleflies gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
cards.flavor: After encountering them, Squee finally lost his appetite for bugs.

cards.name: Phyrexian Broodlings
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phyrexian Broodlings.
cards.flavor: With limited resources and near unlimited time, Kerrick used parts from one beast to build another.

cards.name: Phyrexian Colossus
cards.text:
Phyrexian Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step.
Pay 8 life: Untap Phyrexian Colossus.
Phyrexian Colossus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

cards.name: Phyrexian Debaser
cards.text:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Debaser: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The second stage of the illness: high fever and severe infectiousness."
—Phyrexian progress notes

cards.name: Phyrexian Defiler
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Defiler: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The third stage of the illness: muscle aches and persistent cough."
—Phyrexian progress notes

cards.name: Phyrexian Denouncer
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Denouncer: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The first stage of the illness: rash and nausea."
—Phyrexian progress notes

cards.name: Phyrexian Gargantua
cards.text: When Phyrexian Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
cards.flavor: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.

cards.name: Phyrexian Ghoul
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

cards.name: Phyrexian Hulk
cards.flavor:
It doesn't think. It doesn't feel.
It doesn't laugh or cry.
All it does from dusk till dawn
Is make the soldiers die.
—Onean children's rhyme

cards.name: Phyrexian Negator
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.
cards.flavor: They exist to cease.

cards.name: Phyrexian Plaguelord
cards.text:
{T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Plaguelord: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The final stage of the illness: delirium, convulsions, and death."
—Phyrexian progress notes

cards.name: Phyrexian Processor
cards.text:
As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life.
{4}, {T}: Put an X/X black Minion creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.

cards.name: Phyrexian Totem
cards.text:
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{2}{B}: Phyrexian Totem becomes a 5/5 black Horror artifact creature with trample until end of turn.
Whenever Phyrexian Totem is dealt damage, if it's a creature, sacrifice that many permanents.

cards.name: Phyrexian Vault
cards.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"The secrets of Phyrexia are expensive. You will pay in brass and bone, steel and sinew."
—Kaervek

cards.name: Power Armor
cards.text: Domain — {3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor:
"Great peril demands formidable weaponry."
—Urza

cards.name: Priest of Gix
cards.text: When Priest of Gix enters the battlefield, add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Gix doesn't want a people to rule but puppets to entertain his madness."
—Xantcha, Phyrexian outcast

cards.name: Puppet Strings
cards.text: {2}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.
cards.flavor: "Have no illusions," Volrath warned Greven, "about free will."

cards.name: Quirion Elves
cards.text:
As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Rith's Charm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target nonbasic land.
• Put three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.
• Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.

cards.name: Rith, the Awakener
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Rith, the Awakener deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, choose a color, then put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each permanent of that color.

cards.name: Sanguine Guard
cards.text:
First strike
{1}{B}: Regenerate Sanguine Guard.
cards.flavor:
"Father of Machines! Your filigree gaze carves us, and the scars dance upon our grateful flesh."
—Phyrexian Scriptures

cards.name: Shivan Oasis
cards.text:
Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.

cards.name: Slay
cards.text:
Destroy target green creature. It can't be regenerated.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: The elves had the edge in guile, skill, and valor. But in the end, only sheer numbers mattered.

cards.name: Sunscape Battlemage
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{G} and/or {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} and/or {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {1}{G} kicker, destroy target creature with flying.
When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {2}{U} kicker, draw two cards.

cards.name: Tendrils of Corruption
cards.text: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.
cards.flavor: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

cards.name: Terramorphic Expanse
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Thornscape Apprentice
cards.text:
{R}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

cards.name: Thornscape Battlemage
cards.text:
Kicker {R} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {R} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.)
When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {R} kicker, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {W} kicker, destroy target artifact.

cards.name: Thunderscape Battlemage
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{B} and/or {G} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} and/or {G} as you cast this spell.)
When Thunderscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, target player discards two cards.
When Thunderscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {G} kicker, destroy target enchantment.

cards.name: Treva's Charm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target attacking creature.
• Draw a card, then discard a card.

cards.name: Treva, the Renewer
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Treva, the Renewer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, choose a color, then you gain 1 life for each permanent of that color.

cards.name: Tribal Flames
cards.text: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
cards.flavor:
"Fire is the universal language."
—Jhoira, master artificer

cards.name: Urza's Rage
cards.text:
Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Urza's Rage can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If Urza's Rage was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented.

cards.name: Verduran Emissary
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
When Verduran Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Voltaic Key
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Untap target artifact.
cards.flavor: The key did not work on a single lock, yet it opened many doors.

cards.name: Whispersilk Cloak
cards.text:
Equipped creature can't be blocked and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {2}
cards.flavor: Such cloaks are in high demand both by assassins and by those who fear them.

cards.name: Worn Powerstone
cards.text:
Worn Powerstone enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {2} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Even a fragment of a powerstone contains within it not just energy, but space—vast dimensions trapped in fragile crystal.

cards.name: Yavimaya Elder
cards.text:
When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
{2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.
